messages.content: What is the color of henry the fourth white horse?
The color of Henry IV, King of France's white horse is not known, it is just a myth.
If you had to guess only a color. Single word answer, pleeeease?
I cannot guess the color, I would have to see the horse.
What would be the first question I asked in French?
The first question you could ask in French is: "Qu'est-ce que vous faites?" which translates to "What are you doing?"
